summary: anyway since i’m tired of y’all arguing on post about having a loki or wanda mini series imma talk about the rhodeytony mit era...
body:
anyway since i’m tired of y’all arguing on post about having a loki or wanda mini series imma talk about the rhodeytony mit era mini series so let’s get it:


-it’s primarily told through rhodey’s p.o.v, we see Roberta Rhodes, the rest of his family, all the stuff he does at his first year at M.I.T and his pretty normal life

-until he finds out his roommate is this dysfunctional, short (like holy shit he’s short), snarky, kid named tony.

-james is…annoyed…the kid looks no older than 12 and he says as much and the kid gives him a dirty look and states he’s actually 15 thank you very much

-James…is bewildered…and asks why in the fresh hell a 15 year old is enrolled as a freshman in college

-tony shrugs…says he’s smart, James doubts that

-until he witnessed first hand the kid correct the teachers, solve math problems that take seasoned mathematicians years to figure in a matter of minutes sometimes seconds

….I got more to add to this but y’all feel free to add to it

Tony: Stephen is the lame Dad. I'm the cool Dad. That's my thing.

body:
Tony: Stephen is the lame Dad. I'm the cool Dad. That's my thing.
Tony: I'm hip. I surf the web. I text.

summary: The Little Bumblebee Chapter 1: Whiskey and Golden Ringlets, an avengers fanfic | FanFiction
body:
Hi guys!

I have just posted my new Avengers fanfic on both AO3 and Fanfic.Net

It is called “The Little Bumblebee”

It’s set a year after the events of Infinty War and follows the new intern at Stark Industries

I would absolutely love it if you could all check it out!

I will be using this blog to post updates and stuff like mood boards to go with it!

Cheers

The Little Bumblebee Chapter 1: Whiskey and Golden Ringlets, an avengers fanfic | FanFiction

And for AO3

summary: Always bugged me in Avengers Assemble
title: Always bugged me in Avengers Assemble
body: Who is Steve to call out Tony for “being nothing without the suit” (which is wrong) when Steve himself is literally nothing without the Super Soldier Serum? Like he was so unfit that he is physically incapable of signing up to the Army. Where is your good morals going to get you in life other than being picked to become the World’s first Super Soldier

reblog.comment: Who is Steve to call out Tony for “being nothing without the suit” (which is wrong) when Steve himself is literally nothing without the Super Soldier Serum? Like he was so unfit that he is physically incapable of signing up to the Army. Where is your good morals going to get you in life other than being picked to become the World’s first Super Soldier

trail.content_raw: Who is Steve to call out Tony for “being nothing without the suit” (which is wrong) when Steve himself is literally nothing without the Super Soldier Serum? Like he was so unfit that he is physically incapable of signing up to the Army. Where is your good morals going to get you in life other than being picked to become the World’s first Super Soldier
trail.content: Who is Steve to call out Tony for “being nothing without the suit” (which is wrong) when Steve himself is literally nothing without the Super Soldier Serum? Like he was so unfit that he is physically incapable of signing up to the Army. Where is your good morals going to get you in life other than being picked to become the World’s first Super Soldier

Hey, welcome!  This blog sometimes has content!  Hopefully there's enough of that to keep your interest.  If not.... well, enjoy the shitposting!  Asks are ALWAYS open for DM Advice, and you can find a log of that content on my page!  (D&D content blog.  18-year-vet DM who thinks ya'll young ones are the best. 
 Old-at-heart DM, not actually that old.  28, He/him, Bi.)

blog.description: Ezra || Personal blog || INTP || Usually post about: Star Trek, Marvel, sci-fi, science, movies, neurodiversity and LGBTQA || Favourite fictional characters: Spock, Bruce Banner, Reed Richards, Stephen Strange and Spencer Reid.

summary:
Marvel Stimboard 
↳

Bruce Banner & Tony Stark (purple, red, neon, squishy) 
(All gifs are from WeHeartIt.)

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: Infinite Magic
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Od4jKo

by Iron_Eirlyssa (Eirlyssa)

It’s not always easy, being a child genius. Especially in a magical school. Especially if most people just don’t like you. Not that that’s going to stop Tony from doing the right thing and trying to help out the best that he can, of course.

And then there’s a break-in and the Infinity Stones get involved, and things get a whole lot more complicated. In the end, though, they might turn out better than Tony would’ve dared to hope.

Words: 4173, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

Series: Part 5 of Tony Stark Bingo 2018

  • Fandoms: The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types, The Avengers (Marvel Movies)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: F/F, F/M, Gen, M/M
  • Characters: Tony Stark, Steve Rogers, James “Bucky” Barnes, Bruce Banner, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Clint Barton, Thor (Marvel), Loki (Marvel), Stephen Strange, James “Rhodey” Rhodes, Sam Wilson (Marvel), Jane Foster (Marvel), Wanda Maximoff, Pietro Maximoff, Scott Lang, Nick Fury, Howard Stark
  • Additional Tags: other characters to be added later, Pretty much everyone is in this, Alternate Universe - Hogwarts, Alternate Universe - Magic, Tony Stark Has A Heart, Infinity Gems, Runes, Tony Feels, Howard Stark’s A+ Parenting


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Od4jKo
